module.name: ngs
module.label: NGS module
module.description: Extension to Observ-OM to support Next Gen Sequencing (NGS) projects using the Illumina platform. Each project consists of NGS experiments having one NGS sample. One or more samples are placed on a FlowcellLane, optionally with a barcode. An experiment can be performed one time or may on the same sample. Additionally an experiment can contain a merged collection of experiments done on the same sample.
